com.xhive.core.interfaces
Interface XhiveFederationFactoryIf.PathMapper

Enclosing interface:
XhiveFederationFactoryIf
public static interface XhiveFederationFactoryIf.PathMapper

An interface that can be implemented to restore federations to directories different from the original location.

Since:
X-Hive/DB 5.0
See Also:
XhiveFederationFactoryIf.restoreFederation(java.nio.channels.ReadableByteChannel, java.lang.String, com.xhive.core.interfaces.XhiveFederationFactoryIf.PathMapper)

Method Summary
 java.lang.String getPath(java.lang.String originalPath, java.lang.String databaseName, java.lang.String segmentId)
          Called by the federation restore process to find the path to restore database files to.
 

Method Detail

getPath

java.lang.String getPath(java.lang.String originalPath,
                         java.lang.String databaseName,
                         java.lang.String segmentId)
                         throws java.io.IOException
Called by the federation restore process to find the path to restore database files to. To avoid mistakes, existing files are never overwritten. None of the files that are created by this method should already exist.

Parameters:
originalPath - The path in the original bootstrap file. This does not include the filename. Can be null if no path was specified when creating the file.
databaseName - The name of the database that the file belongs to or null for the log directory path.
segmentId - The id of the segment that the file belongs to.
Throws:
java.io.IOException
Since:
X-Hive/DB 5.0
